title: What's wrong with your client
body: I wait in a 10 minute queue and now I go into champ select the second I'm in I crash so I lose 3 lp + wait another 5 mintues that's 15 minutes. What's actually wrong with your client? Millions of people play this game. So I really recommend that you fix this issue. And no don't tell me it's my connection cause it's not it's just your client.

replies.body:
The last post you made about this, I suggested you work through our connection guide to ensure your local settings are compatible with League. 

I'd like to know if you were ever able to work through all of those steps and if they caused any change.
I'm too lazy to work through all that it's too much you can't expect me to do that all :/
TRUEEEE! HE LIKE LEAGUE BUT NOT ENOUGH TO TRY TO FIX THE PROBLEM PREVENTING HIM FROM PLAYING THE GAME BUT ENOUGH TO COMPLAIN ABOUT IT.
The steps may look intimidating, but they're actually pretty quick and the guide should only take a few minutes to complete.

You can [[Click Here]](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) For the list of steps. I strongly recommend doing *each one* and if you still have issues *after* completing those steps, let me know.
also which step do i do
Maybe you should get better wifi. OHOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!!! 111
